mapper.select:
/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-dao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-selectOneMenuGrpMngr */
select /*+ ccd_usrdpht_s07$S01_메뉴그룹 관리자 조회 DAM */ decode(count(*), 0, 'N', 'Y') as RTUR_YN from CSMGLMGMT a, CSMGMNGMT b, ( select USER_ID from CCUSRDPHT where LGIN_ID = ( select LGIN_ID from CCUSRDPHT where USER_ID = #{userId} and APST_YMD < sysdate and APFN_YMD > sysdate ) and APST_YMD < sysdate and APFN_YMD > sysdate) c where a.APST_DT < sysdate and a.APFN_DT > sysdate and b.MENU_GRP_ID = a.MENU_GRP_ID and b.USER_ID = c.USER_ID and b.APST_DT < sysdate and b.APFN_DT > sysdate and b.MENU_GRP_MNGR_GRAD_CD = 1

select /*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-dao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-selectOneMenuAthrExstYn */ count(*) as RTUR_VL from CSMNUATMT where MENU_GRP_ID = #{menuGrpId} and APST_DT < sysdate and APFN_DT > sysdate

select /*+ com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-dao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-selectOneMenuIntgPrvsCnfr_메뉴통합 사전 확인 기능 */ nvl(max(MENU_ID), 'NONE') as RTUR_VL from CSMNGRPMT where MENU_GRP_ID = #{menuGrpId} and MENU_ID = #{menuId} and APST_DT < sysdate and APFN_DT > sysdate

select /*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-dao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-selectOneMenuGrpMngrByLginId */ decode(count(*), 0, 'N', 'Y') as RTUR_YN from CSMGMNGMT where USER_ID = #{lginId} and APST_DT < sysdate and APFN_DT > sysdate and MENU_GRP_MNGR_GRAD_CD = '1'

select /*+ com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-dao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-SelectOneComnMenuExstYn_공통권한 확인 조회 */ count(*) as RTUR_VL from CSMGLMGMT where COMN_YN = 'Y' and ((nvl(#{menuGrpId},'*') = '*') or (MENU_GRP_ID <> #{menuGrpId}))

select /*+ com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-dao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-selectOneMenuGrpIdNorn_메뉴그룹ID채번 */ 'A' || lpad(to_number(substr( nvl(max(MENU_GRP_ID), '0000000') , 2, 7)) +1, 7, '0') as MENU_GRP_ID , nvl(max(MENU_GRP_APLY_SQNC), 0) + 1 as MENU_GRP_APLY_SQNC from CSMGLMGMT

select /*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-dao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-listMenuGrp */ ta.MENU_GRP_ID as MENU_GRP_ID , ta.MENU_GRP_NM as MENU_GRP_NM , ta.MENU_GRP_DSCR_CTN as MENU_GRP_DSCR_CTN , ta.COMN_YN as COMN_YN , ta.APST_DT as APST_DT , ta.APFN_DT as APFN_DT , ta.MENU_GRP_APLY_SQNC as MENU_GRP_APLY_SQNC , ta.ATMT_STUP_YN as ATMT_STUP_YN from ( select a.MENU_GRP_ID , a.MENU_GRP_NM , a.MENU_GRP_DSCR_CTN , nvl(a.COMN_YN, 'N') as COMN_YN , to_char(a.APST_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') as APST_DT , to_char(a.APFN_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') as APFN_DT , a.MENU_GRP_APLY_SQNC , nvl(a.ATMT_STUP_YN, 'N') as ATMT_STUP_YN from CSMGLMGMT a , CSMGMNGMT b where a.MENU_GRP_NM like '%' || #{menuGrpNm} || '%' and a.APST_DT < sysdate and a.APFN_DT > sysdate and a.MENU_GRP_ID = b.MENU_GRP_ID(+) and b.USER_ID = nvl(#{userId}, b.USER_ID) and b.APST_DT < sysdate and b.APFN_DT > sysdate ) ta group by ta.MENU_GRP_ID , ta.MENU_GRP_NM , ta.MENU_GRP_DSCR_CTN , ta.COMN_YN , ta.APST_DT , ta.APFN_DT , ta.MENU_GRP_APLY_SQNC , ta.ATMT_STUP_YN order by ta.MENU_GRP_APLY_SQNC

select /*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-dao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-listMenuGrpByMngr */ MENU_GRP_ID as MENU_GRP_ID from CSMGMNGMT where USER_ID = #{userId} and APST_DT < sysdate and APFN_DT > sysdate group by MENU_GRP_ID
select /*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-dao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-listScrnStupInfmMenuByWorkScop */ MENU_ID as MENU_ID from CSWKSITMT where MENU_GRP_ID = #{menuGrpId}

select /*+ com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-dao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-listMenuGrpMltiLngg_메뉴그룹 다국어 조회 */ a.MENU_GRP_ID as MENU_GRP_ID , a.MENU_ID as MENU_ID , a.LNGG_CD as LNGG_CD , b.DETL_CD_NM as DETL_CD_NM , a.MENU_NM as MENU_NM from CSMENULMT a , CCCMCDDMT b where a.MENU_GRP_ID = #{menuGrpId} and a.MENU_ID = nvl(#{menuId}, a.MENU_ID) and b.COMN_GRP_CD = 'CCC_003' and b.COMN_DTLS_CD = a.LNGG_CD order by b.DETL_CD_NM

select /*+ com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-dao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-listTlbr_툴바조회 */ a.MENU_GRP_ID as MENU_GRP_ID , a.TLBR_DVSN_CD as TLBR_DVSN_CD , b.DETL_CD_NM as DETL_CD_NM , a.TLBR_PRGM_ID as TLBR_PRGM_ID , c.PRGM_NM as PRGM_NM , a.TLBR_NM as TLBR_NM from CSMNGTLMT a , CCCMCDDMT b , CSPRMLTMT c where a.MENU_GRP_ID = #{menuGrpId} and b.COMN_GRP_CD = 'CSX_003' and b.COMN_DTLS_CD = a.TLBR_DVSN_CD and c.PRGM_ID = a.TLBR_PRGM_ID order by a.TLBR_DVSN_CD

select /*+ com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-dao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-listIntgMenu_메뉴그룹 메뉴 조회 */ a.MENU_GRP_ID as MENU_GRP_ID, a.MENU_ID as MENU_ID, a.BSIS_LNGG_MENU_NM as BSIS_LNGG_MENU_NM, nvl(b.MENU_NM, a.BSIS_LNGG_MENU_NM) as MENU_NM, a.MENU_FRMT_CD as MENU_FRMT_CD, d.DETL_CD_NM as DETL_CD_NM, a.HGRN_MENU_ID as HGRN_MENU_ID, a.INQR_SQNC as INQR_SQNC, a.PRGM_ID as PRGM_ID, c.PRGM_NM as PRGM_NM, a.ATMT_EXCT_YN as ATMT_EXCT_YN, a.MENU_EXRN_YN as MENU_EXRN_YN, a.MTSG_YN as MTSG_YN, a.SWMD_YN as SWMD_YN, a.EXCT_SCOP_CD as EXCT_SCOP_CD, a.EXCT_VRAB_VL as EXCT_VRAB_VL from CSMNGRPMT a, CSMENULMT b, CSPRMLTMT c, CCCMCDDMT d where a.MENU_GRP_ID = #{menuGrpId} and a.APST_DT < sysdate and a.APFN_DT > sysdate and ((nvl(#{prgmId}, '*') = '*') or (a.PRGM_ID = #{prgmId}) ) and ((nvl(#{menuNm}, '*') = '*') or (a.MENU_ID like '%' || #{menuNm} || '%') or (nvl(b.MENU_NM, a.BSIS_LNGG_MENU_NM) like '%' || #{menuNm} || '%')) and b.MENU_GRP_ID(+) = a.MENU_GRP_ID and b.MENU_ID(+) = a.MENU_ID and b.LNGG_CD(+) = #{lnggCd} and c.PRGM_ID(+) = a.PRGM_ID and nvl(c.DLTN_YN(+), 'N') = 'N' and d.COMN_GRP_CD(+) = 'CSM_004' /* 메뉴형태코드 */ and d.COMN_DTLS_CD(+) = a.MENU_FRMT_CD

select /*+ com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-dao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-listMenuUsePrgmInfm_메뉴사용 프로그램정보 조회 */ '' as RTUR_VL , ta.PRGM_ID as PRGM_ID /* 프로그램ID */ , ta.PRGM_NM as PRGM_NM /* 프로그램명 */ , ( select nvl(count(tb.PRGM_ID), 0) /* 프로그램ID */ from CSMNGRPMT tb /* 통합메뉴_T */ where tb.MENU_GRP_ID = #{menuGrpId} and tb.PRGM_ID = ta.PRGM_ID and tb.APST_DT < sysdate and tb.APFN_DT > sysdate ) as RTUR_VL_1 from CSPRMLTMT ta /* 프로그램목록_T */ where ( (nvl(#{prgmNm}, '*') = '*') or (upper(ta.PRGM_ID) like upper(#{prgmNm}) || '%') or (upper(ta.PRGM_NM) like '%' || upper(#{prgmNm}) || '%') ) and nvl(ta.DLTN_YN, 'N') = 'N' and ( (nvl(#{srchCndtCtn}, '*') = '*') or (ta.MENU_GRP_ID = nvl(#{menuGrpId}, ta.MENU_GRP_ID)) )
and ( ( nvl(ta.PRGM_ID,'*') = '*') or ta.PRGM_ID in ( select b.PRGM_ID from CSMHSPMOT a /* 병원별모듈_T */ ,CSMMDPRGT b /* 모듈별프로그램_T */ where a.MODU_ID = b.MODU_ID and a.USE_YN = 'Y' and a.USE_YN = #{isHospModule} ) )
order by ta.PRGM_ID

select /*+ com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-dao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-listMenuAthrStupTrgt_메뉴권한 설정대상 조회 */ MENU_ATHR_ID as MENU_ATHR_ID , MENU_ATHR_NM as MENU_ATHR_NM , decode(ATMT_STUP_YN, 'Y', 'Y', '') as ATMT_STUP_YN , 'N' as MENU_EXRN_YN , 'N' as MENU_ACTV_YN from CSMNUATMT where MENU_GRP_ID = #{menuGrpId} and APST_DT < sysdate and APFN_DT > sysdate

select /*+ com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-dao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-listMenuGrpMngrHmScrn_메뉴그룹관리자 홈화면 조회 */ '0' as SRCH_YN , a.MENU_ID as MENU_ID , a.INQR_SQNC as INQR_SQNC , b.BSIS_LNGG_MENU_NM as BSIS_LNGG_MENU_NM , nvl(a.PRIN_YN , 'Y') as PRIN_YN from CSMNHOMMT a , CSMNGRPMT b where a.MENU_GRP_ID = b.MENU_GRP_ID and a.MENU_ID = b.MENU_ID and a.MENU_GRP_ID = #{menuGrpId} and b.APST_DT < sysdate and b.APFN_DT > sysdate

select /*+ com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-dao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-listHmScrnbyMenuGrp_메뉴그룹별 홈화면 조회 */ b.LGIN_ID as LGIN_ID , b.USER_NM as USER_NM , c.DETL_CD_NM as DETL_CD_NM , d.BSIS_LNGG_MENU_NM as BSIS_LNGG_MENU_NM , a.MENU_ID as MENU_ID from CSURHOMMT a , CCUSERAMV b , CCCMCDDMT c , CSMNGRPMT d where a.LGIN_ID = b.LGIN_ID and c.COMN_GRP_CD(+) = 'CS001' and b.USER_STTS_CD = c.COMN_DTLS_CD(+) and a.MENU_GRP_ID = #{menuGrpId} and ((nvl(#{menuId}, '*') = '*') or (a.MENU_ID = #{menuId})) and a.MENU_GRP_ID = d.MENU_GRP_ID and a.MENU_ID = d.MENU_ID

select /*+ com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-dao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-listSpdBttnbyMenuGrp_메뉴그룹별 스피드버튼 조회 */ c.LGIN_ID as LGIN_ID , c.USER_NM as USER_NM , d.DETL_CD_NM as DETL_CD_NM , b.SPD_BTTN_GRP_NM as SPD_BTTN_GRP_NM , a.SPD_BTTN_NM as SPD_BTTN_NM , a.MENU_ID as MENU_ID from CSSPDITMT a , CSSPDGPMT b , CCUSERAMV c , CCCMCDDMT d where a.LGIN_ID = b.LGIN_ID and a.SPD_BTTN_GRP_ID = b.SPD_BTTN_GRP_ID and a.LGIN_ID = c.LGIN_ID and a.MENU_GRP_ID = #{menuGrpId} and ((nvl(#{menuId}, '*') = '*') or (a.MENU_ID = #{menuId})) and d.COMN_GRP_CD(+) = 'CS001' and c.USER_STTS_CD = d.COMN_DTLS_CD(+) order by a.LGIN_ID, c.USER_NM, b.SPD_BTTN_GRP_NM

select /*+ com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-dao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-listCareGrad_간호등급 조회 */ CARE_GRAD_CD as CARE_GRAD_CD, CARE_GRAD_NM as CARE_GRAD_NM, CARE_GRAD_CD || '-' || CARE_GRAD_NM as RTUR_VL from MNAGRADCT where USE_YN = 'Y' order by PRRT_SQNC

select /*+ com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-dao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-listMenuGrp2_메뉴그룹목록 조회 */ ta.MENU_GRP_ID as MENU_GRP_ID, ta.MENU_GRP_NM as MENU_GRP_NM, ta.MENU_GRP_DSCR_CTN as MENU_GRP_DSCR_CTN, ta.COMN_YN as COMN_YN, ta.APST_DT as APST_DT, ta.APFN_DT as APFN_DT, ta.MENU_GRP_APLY_SQNC as MENU_GRP_APLY_SQNC, ta.ATMT_STUP_YN as ATMT_STUP_YN from ( select a.MENU_GRP_ID , a.MENU_GRP_NM , a.MENU_GRP_DSCR_CTN , nvl(a.COMN_YN, 'N') as COMN_YN , to_char(a.APST_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') as APST_DT , to_char(a.APFN_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') as APFN_DT , a.MENU_GRP_APLY_SQNC , nvl(a.ATMT_STUP_YN, 'N') as ATMT_STUP_YN from CSMGLMGMT a /* 메뉴그룹목록관리 */ , CSMGMNGMT b /* 메뉴그룹관리자 */ where a.MENU_GRP_NM like '%' || #{menuGrpNm} || '%' and a.APST_DT < sysdate and a.APFN_DT > sysdate and a.MENU_GRP_ID = b.MENU_GRP_ID(+) and ((nvl(#{userId}, '*') = '*') or (b.USER_ID = #{userId})) and b.APST_DT < sysdate and b.APFN_DT > sysdate and a.COMN_YN = 'N' union select a.MENU_GRP_ID , a.MENU_GRP_NM , a.MENU_GRP_DSCR_CTN , nvl(a.COMN_YN, 'N') as COMN_YN , to_char(a.APST_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') as APST_DT , to_char(a.APFN_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') as APFN_DT , 99999 as MENU_GRP_APLY_SQNC , nvl(a.ATMT_STUP_YN, 'N') as ATMT_STUP_YN from CSMGLMGMT a /* 메뉴그룹목록관리 */ where a.COMN_YN = 'Y' and a.APST_DT < sysdate and a.APFN_DT > sysdate ) ta group by ta.MENU_GRP_ID , ta.MENU_GRP_NM , ta.MENU_GRP_DSCR_CTN , ta.COMN_YN , ta.APST_DT , ta.APFN_DT , ta.MENU_GRP_APLY_SQNC , ta.ATMT_STUP_YN order by ta.MENU_GRP_APLY_SQNC

select /*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-dao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-listMenuGrpTlbr */ a.LGIN_ID as LGIN_ID , a.MENU_GRP_ID as MENU_GRP_ID , b.MENU_GRP_NM as MENU_GRP_NM , nvl(a.TLBR_USE_YN, 'N') as TLBR_USE_YN , a.MENU_GRP_APLY_SQNC as MENU_GRP_APLY_SQNC , case when EXISTS( select c.TLBR_DVSN_CD from CSMNGTLMT c where c.MENU_GRP_ID = a.MENU_GRP_ID ) then 'Y' else 'N' end as RTUR_VL from CSMNUSRMT a , CSMGLMGMT b where a.LGIN_ID = #{lginId} and a.APST_DT < sysdate and a.APFN_DT > sysdate and a.MENU_GRP_ID = b.MENU_GRP_ID and b.APST_DT < sysdate and b.APFN_DT > sysdate order by a.MENU_GRP_APLY_SQNC

select /*+ com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-dao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-listMenuGrpMngr_메뉴그룹 관리자 조회 */ a.USER_ID as USER_ID, b.USER_NM as USER_NM, c.KORN_DPRT_NM as KORN_DPRT_NM, e.DETL_CD_NM as OCDT_NM, f.DETL_CD_NM as OCFM_NM, a.MENU_GRP_MNGR_GRAD_CD as MENU_GRP_MNGR_GRAD_CD, g.DETL_CD_NM as DETL_CD_NM_1, h.DETL_CD_NM as DETL_CD_NM_2 from CSMGMNGMT a, CCUSRDPHT b, HZDEPTMMT c, CCUSERAMT d, CCCMCDDMT e, CCCMCDDMT f, CCCMCDDMT g, CCCMCDDMT h where a.MENU_GRP_ID = #{menuGrpId} and a.APST_DT < sysdate and a.APFN_DT > sysdate and b.USER_ID = a.USER_ID and c.DPRT_CD = b.MDCR_DPRT_CD and d.LGIN_ID = b.LGIN_ID and e.COMN_GRP_CD(+) = 'GP009' /* 직무코드 */ and e.COMN_DTLS_CD(+) = d.OCDT_CD and f.COMN_GRP_CD(+) = 'GP170' /* 직종코드 */ and f.COMN_DTLS_CD(+) = d.OCFM_CD and g.COMN_GRP_CD(+) = 'CSM_001' /* 메뉴그룹관리자등급코드 */ and G.COMN_DTLS_CD(+) = a.MENU_GRP_MNGR_GRAD_CD and h.COMN_GRP_CD(+) = 'CS001' /* 사용자상태코드 */ and h.COMN_DTLS_CD(+) = d.USER_STTS_CD order by DETL_CD_NM_1, b.USER_NM

select /*+ com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-dao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-listScrnByMenuGrp_메뉴그룹별 화면정보 조회 */ a.PRGM_ID as PRGM_ID , a.PRGM_NM as PRGM_NM from CSPRMLTMT a where a.MENU_GRP_ID = #{menuGrpId} order by a.PRGM_ID
mapper.update: update /*+ com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-dao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-updateMenu_메뉴수정 */ CSMNGRPMT set APFN_DT = decode(#{srchCndtCtn}, 'D', sysdate, APFN_DT) , BSIS_LNGG_MENU_NM = nvl(#{bsisLnggMenuNm}, BSIS_LNGG_MENU_NM) , MENU_FRMT_CD = nvl(#{menuFrmtCd}, MENU_FRMT_CD) , HGRN_MENU_ID = nvl(#{hgrnMenuId}, HGRN_MENU_ID) , ATMT_EXCT_YN = nvl(#{atmtExctYn}, ATMT_EXCT_YN) , MTSG_YN = nvl(#{mtsgYn}, MTSG_YN) , MENU_EXRN_YN = nvl(#{menuExrnYn}, MENU_EXRN_YN) , SWMD_YN = nvl(#{swmdYn}, SWMD_YN) , EXCT_SCOP_CD = nvl(#{exctScopCd}, EXCT_SCOP_CD) , EXCT_VRAB_VL = #{exctVrabVl} , INQR_SQNC = decode(#{inqrSqnc}, 0, INQR_SQNC, #{inqrSqnc}) , PRGM_ID = #{prgmId} , LAST_UPDR_ID = #{gvUserId} , LAST_UPDT_IP = #{gvUserIp} , LAST_UPDT_DT = sysdate , LAST_UPDT_CLNT_PRGM_ID = #{gvClntPrgmId} , LAST_UPDT_SRVR_PRGM_ID = #{gvSrvrPrgmId} where MENU_GRP_ID = #{menuGrpId} and ((nvl(#{menuId}, '*') = '*') or (MENU_ID = #{menuId})) and APST_DT < sysdate and APFN_DT > sysdate

update /*+ com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-dao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-updateMenuGrp_메뉴그룹목록관리 수정 */ CSMGLMGMT set MENU_GRP_NM = decode(#{menuGrpNm}, null, MENU_GRP_NM, #{menuGrpNm}) , MENU_GRP_DSCR_CTN = decode(#{menuGrpDscrCtn}, null, MENU_GRP_DSCR_CTN, #{menuGrpDscrCtn}) , COMN_YN = decode(#{comnYn}, null, COMN_YN, #{comnYn}) , APST_DT = decode(#{apstDt}, null, APST_DT, to_date(#{apstDt}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) , APFN_DT = decode(#{apfnDt}, null, APFN_DT, to_date(#{apfnDt}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) , MENU_GRP_APLY_SQNC = decode(#{menuGrpAplySqnc}, 0, MENU_GRP_APLY_SQNC, #{menuGrpAplySqnc}) , ATMT_STUP_YN = decode(#{atmtStupYn}, null, ATMT_STUP_YN, #{atmtStupYn}) , LAST_UPDR_ID = #{gvUserId} , LAST_UPDT_IP = #{gvUserIp} , LAST_UPDT_DT = sysdate , LAST_UPDT_CLNT_PRGM_ID = #{gvClntPrgmId} , LAST_UPDT_SRVR_PRGM_ID = #{gvSrvrPrgmId} where MENU_GRP_ID = #{menuGrpId} and APST_DT < sysdate and APFN_DT > sysdate

update /*+ com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-dao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-updateMenuGrpDsplSqnc_메뉴그룹 적용순서 수정 DAM */ CSMGLMGMT set MENU_GRP_APLY_SQNC = MENU_GRP_APLY_SQNC - 1, LAST_UPDR_ID = #{gvUserId}, LAST_UPDT_IP = #{gvUserIp}, LAST_UPDT_DT = sysdate, LAST_UPDT_CLNT_PRGM_ID = #{gvClntPrgmId}, LAST_UPDT_SRVR_PRGM_ID = #{gvSrvrPrgmId} where APST_DT < sysdate and APFN_DT > sysdate and MENU_GRP_APLY_SQNC > #{menuGrpAplySqnc}
mapper.delete: delete /*+ com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-dao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-DeleteMenuGrpTlbrStup_메뉴그룹 툴바 설정 삭제 */ from CSMNGTLMT where MENU_GRP_ID = #{menuGrpId} and ( (nvl(#{tlbrDvsnCd}, '*') = '*') or (TLBR_DVSN_CD = #{tlbrDvsnCd}) )

delete /*+ com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-dao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-deleteMenuGrpMltiLngg_메뉴그룹 다국어 삭제 */ from CSMENULMT where MENU_GRP_ID = #{menuGrpId} and ((nvl(#{menuId}, '*') = '*') or (MENU_ID = #{menuId})) and ((nvl(#{lnggCd}, '*') = '*') or (LNGG_CD = #{lnggCd}))

delete /*+ com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-dao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-deleteSpdBttnbyMenuGrp_스피드버튼 메뉴그룹별 버튼삭제 */ from CSSPDITMT where ((nvl(#{lginId}, '*') = '*') or (LGIN_ID = #{lginId})) and ((nvl(#{menuGrpId}, '*') = '*') or (MENU_GRP_ID = #{menuGrpId})) and ((nvl(#{menuId}, '*') = '*') or (MENU_ID = #{menuId}))

delete /*+ com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-dao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-deleteUserHmScrnStup_사용자 홈화면 설정 삭제 */ from CSURHOMMT where ((nvl(#{lginId}, '*') = '*') or (LGIN_ID = #{lginId})) and ((nvl(#{menuGrpId}, '*') = '*') or (MENU_GRP_ID = #{menuGrpId})) and ((nvl(#{menuId}, '*') = '*') or (MENU_ID = #{menuId}))

update /*+ com-sdeleteMenuGrpMngrs-healthcare-ehr-com-cs-ccs-deleteMenuGrpMngrao-CcsMenuGrpMngmDAO-deleteMenuGrpMngr_메뉴그룹 적용순서 수정 DAM */ CSMGMNGMT set APFN_DT = sysdate, LAST_UPDR_ID = #{gvUserId}, LAST_UPDT_IP = #{gvUserIp}, LAST_UPDT_DT = sysdate, LAST_UPDT_CLNT_PRGM_ID = #{gvClntPrgmId}, LAST_UPDT_SRVR_PRGM_ID = #{gvSrvrPrgmId} where APST_DT < sysdate and APFN_DT > sysdate and MENU_GRP_ID = #{menuGrpId}
